product_name: Pearl Izumi Race Road III Bike Shoes - Women's
long_description: Ride hard and fast in the women's Pearl Izumi Race Road III Bike Shoes with top-of-the-line features such as a bi-directional cable closure, longitudinal arch support and a semi-custom fit. SELECT Series nylon and composite-fiber outsoles are lightweight, stiff and durable for excellent power transfer. Direct Vent technology allows cooling and drainage. P.R.O. Leader bi-directional closure lets you micro-adjust the fit on the fly. Concave shaping delivers an ultra-low 7mm stack height and anatomic support. EVA foam and rubber heel bumpers give you stability while walking. Insoles provide excellent longitudinal and transverse arch support for comfort on long rides. Pearl Izumi Race Road III Bike Shoes are SPD compatible.
short_description: Ride hard and fast in the women's Pearl Izumi Race Road III Bike Shoes with top-of-the-line features such as a bi-directional cable closure, longitudinal arch support and a semi-custom fit.
